name: The Ghost Hunting Party
description:
The game involves 5 characters, where the player directly controls the fifth character. The other 4 characters will enter the haunted location, while the fifth character, the Player Character (PC), will remain in place. PC has 3 tasks, namely ghost ID, guide & help NPCs, and make ghost repellent/destroying weapons.

- 4 unit control, RTS Style
- Randomized ghost every round / play
- Craft system
- Ghost book / wiki
